title: More PlayStation Acquisitions Coming - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.01.22
description:
Greg and Gary run through the rumors of the oncoming acquisition war, talk about the industry's hate of NFTs, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:06 - Housekeeping
PSILY - All about Bungie revolutionizing PlayStation!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:08:32 - More PlayStation Acquisitions Coming, Christopher Dring @ GIB
00:15:00 - My question is, what direct benefit does Sony purchasing Bungie have on the consumer? - Best Friends Q:Nick
00:26:37 - Ad
00:27:41 - NYT Buys Wordle, Josh Wardle - Wordle Creator
00:34:00 - ONE OF THEM ROTATIN’ SEGMENTS
00:40:55 - Team17 Publicly Condemned By Former Business Partner For Selling NFTs, George Yang @ GameSpot
00:54:08 - FTC Looking at Microsoft’s Activision Blizzard Acquisition, David McLaughlin @ Bloomberg
00:55:15 - More Dark Pictures Anthology Incoming! Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:57:35 - Out today
00:58:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Andy
